New Records: Luis Severino pitched 7 innings with 6 hits and 1 earned run, moving the Mets closer to a wild-card spot with the win.
Francisco Lindor sparked the Mets' lineup with a key RBI single in the fourth inning.
Key Match Events: Jose Duran's single in the third inning scored a run, and Brandon Nimmo's double in the third inning set up the next score.
Lindor's RBI single in the fourth inning extended the Mets' lead.
Luis Torrens' double in the fourth inning scored a run due to a fielding error by O'Neill.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was played at Citi Field in Queens, New York, with an attendance of 35,064 fans.
The series stood at 3-0 in favor of the Mets after this win.
Others: The game was covered by ESPN+, with umpires Larry Vanover, Chris Segal, Nate Tomlinson, and David Rackley officiating.
